#summary Software Requirements for CEFive.

= CEFive Requirements Specification =

== System Requirements ==

=== Platform Requirements ===

  # CEFive must run on Custom Firmware.
  # CEFive must run as a Custom Firmware Plugin.

== User Requirements ==

=== Interface Requirements ===

  # CEFive must be rendered on a Debug frame buffer.
  # CEFive must support the D-Pad for cursor movement.
  # CEFive should support the Analog Joystick.
  # CEFive must support the following buttons:
    * Circle
    * Cross
    * Square
    * Triangle
    * Left Trigger
    * Right Trigger
    * Volume +
    * Volume -
    * Music
